biotools.summary: Part of the crambled-seg pipeline. It allows to interactively explore the cellularity, depth of coverage and clonality of tumour samples that have gone for whole-genome sequencing. In particular, it allows the user to assess the competing solutions for such data that can arise from using different packages.

bioschemas.name: Crambled
bioschemas.summary: Part of the crambled-seg pipeline. It allows to interactively explore the cellularity, depth of coverage and clonality of tumour samples that have gone for whole-genome sequencing. In particular, it allows the user to assess the competing solutions for such data that can arise from using different packages.
